identification.author: V B Coen FBCS, FIDM, FIDPM, 17/04/84

validations.errorHandling:
perform  OTM5-Open-Input
              if       fs-reply not = zero
                       perform OTM5-Close
                       go to Main-Exit
              end-if
     end-if
     perform  Purch-Open-Input

if oi-type = 5
              add oi-paid       to t-pay
              add oi-approp     to t-approp
              add oi-deduct-amt to t-deducts

move oi-paid    to l6-i-approp
     end-if
     add      oi-net oi-vat oi-carriage oi-c-vat giving  w
